text:
{"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"3","subject":"Analyze message/inbox system","description":"Research how Claude Code manages inter-agent messaging. Examine:
1. The ~/.claude/teams/<team>/inboxes/ directory structure
2. Individual inbox JSON files (<agent-name>.json) - format and content
3. Message fields: from, text/content, timestamp, read
4. Message types: regular messages, idle_notification, shutdown_request, shutdown_response, shutdown_approved, plan_approval_request, plan_approval_response, broadcast
5. How SendMessage tool works - DM vs broadcast
6. Message routing: sender â†’ recipient inbox file
7. How messages are parsed (JSON-encoded content vs plain text)

Look at live data in ~/.claude/teams/demo-smoke-test/inboxes/ and the Hive source in src/agent_teams/task_sync.rs (read_team_inboxes function).

Write your findings to /Users/fr162241/Projects/hive/agent-teams-analysis/03-message-system.md

Also copy all inbox files from ~/.claude/teams/demo-smoke-test/inboxes/ to /Users/fr162241/Projects/hive/agent-teams-analysis/raw/inboxes/","assignedBy":"team-lead","timestamp":"2026-02-09T15:08:18.038Z"}
